definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It is anti Japanese and anti-imperialist;
sentences.chinese: 帝国主义和殖民主义是双重的罪恶。

sentences.english: All the people had been armed to defend their country against imperialist and colonialists.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人被武装抵御帝国主义和殖民主义的国家。

sentences.english: Although anti-colonialist, it is balanced in its treatment.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是反殖民主义的，但在处理上予以平衡。

sentences.english: It was only a tool of imperialism for pushing neo-colonialism.
sentences.chinese: 它只是帝国主义推行新殖民主义的工具。

sentences.english: Others are still susceptible to the appeal of Mr Mugabe's anti-colonialist rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 其他人仍然受到穆加贝先生反殖民主义言论的影响。

sentences.english: Said's Orientalism is regarded as a foundation work of post-colonialism theory.
sentences.chinese: 萨义德的《东方学》是后殖民主义理论的奠基之作。

sentences.english: Marx never lost an opportunity to castigate colonialism.
sentences.chinese: 马克思从不放过任何谴责殖民主义的机会。

sentences.english: They succeeded in throwing off the yoke of colonialism .
sentences.chinese: 他们终于摆说了殖民主义的桎桔。

sentences.english: His emphasis was on how Middle Eastern countries could emerge from colonialism.
sentences.chinese: 他的研究重点是中东国家何以能够摆脱殖民主义。

sentences.english: Colonialism and neocolonialism are in the same strain.
sentences.chinese: 新老殖民主义是一脉相传的。
他们一直是反对殖民主义的。

sentences.english: He came to view America's military as an instrument of neocolonial occupation.
sentences.chinese: 他把美国军队看作新殖民主义的占领工具。
我们得对殖民主义进行再探索。

sentences.english: The formation of Southern Africa mixed jurisdiction is closely related to colonialism.
sentences.chinese: 南部非洲混合法域的形成与殖民主义密切相关。

definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4
